 51#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 52template<>
 53struct List<op::outer>
 54{
 55  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
 56			 be::cml,
 57			 be::blas,
 58			 be::mercury_sal,
 59			 be::cvsip,
 60			 be::generic>::type type;
 61};
 62#endif
 63
 64/// Generic evaluator for outer product
 65template <typename T1,
 66	  typename Block0,
 67	  typename Block1,
 68	  typename Block2>
 69struct Evaluator<op::outer, be::generic,
 70                 void(Block0&, T1, Block1 const&, Block2 const&)>
 71{
 72  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 73  static bool rt_valid(Block0&, T1, Block1 const&, Block2 const&) 
 74    { return true; }
 75
 76  static void exec(Block0& r, T1 alpha, Block1 const& a, Block2 const& b)
 77  {
 78    assert(a.size(1, 0) == r.size(2, 0));
 79    assert(b.size(1, 0) == r.size(2, 1));
 80
 81    // r(i, j) = alpha * a(i) * b(j)
 82    for ( index_type i = a.size(); i-- > 0; )
 83      for ( index_type j = b.size(); j-- > 0; )
 84        r.put( i, j, alpha * a.get(i) * b.get(j) );
 85  }
 86};
 87
 88/// Generic evaluator for outer product (with conjugate)
 89template <typename T1,
 90	  typename Block0,
 91	  typename Block1,
 92	  typename Block2>
 93struct Evaluator<op::outer, be::generic,
 94                 void(Block0&, std::complex<T1>, Block1 const&, Block2 const&)>
 95{
 96  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 97  static bool rt_valid(Block0&, std::complex<T1>, Block1 const&, Block2 const&) 
 98    { return true; }
 99
100  static void exec(Block0& r, std::complex<T1> alpha, Block1 const& a, Block2 const& b)
101  {
102    assert(a.size(1, 0) == r.size(2, 0));
103    assert(b.size(1, 0) == r.size(2, 1));
104
105    // r(i, j) = alpha * a(i) * b(j)
106    for ( index_type i = a.size(); i-- > 0; )
107      for ( index_type j = b.size(); j-- > 0; )
108        r.put( i, j, alpha * a.get(i) * conj(b.get(j)) );
109  }
110};
111

114#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
115template<>
116struct List<op::dot>
117{
118  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
119			 be::cbe_sdk,
120			 be::cml,
121			 be::cuda,
122			 be::blas,
123			 be::mercury_sal, 
124			 be::cvsip,
125			 be::generic>::type type;
126};
127#endif
128
129/// Generic evaluator for vector-vector dot-product.
130template <typename T,
131	  typename Block0,
132	  typename Block1>
133struct Evaluator<op::dot, be::generic,
134                 T(Block0 const&, Block1 const&)>
135{
136  static bool const ct_valid = true;
137  static bool rt_valid(Block0 const&, Block1 const&) { return true; }
138
139  static T exec(Block0 const& a, Block1 const& b)
140  {
141    assert(a.size(1, 0) == b.size(1, 0));
142
143    T r = T();
144    for ( index_type i = 0; i < a.size(); ++i )
145      r += a.get(i) * b.get(i);
146    return r;
147  }
148};
149
150
151#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
152template<>
153struct List<op::gemp>
154{
155  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
156			 be::cml,
157			 be::blas,
158			 be::mercury_sal, 
159			 be::cvsip,
160			 be::generic>::type type;
161};
162#endif
163
164/// Generic evaluator for general product
165template <typename T1,
166	  typename T2,
167	  typename Block0,
168	  typename Block1,
169	  typename Block2>
170struct Evaluator<op::gemp, be::generic,
171                 void(Block0&, T1, Block1 const&, Block2 const&, T2)>
172{
173  static bool const ct_valid = true;
174  static bool rt_valid(Block0&, T1, Block1 const&, Block2 const&, T2) 
175    { return true; }
176
177  static void exec(Block0& c, T1 alpha, Block1 const& a, 
178    Block2 const& b, T2 beta)
179  {
180    assert( a.size(2, 0) == c.size(2, 0) );
181    assert( b.size(2, 1) == c.size(2, 1) );
182    assert( a.size(2, 1) == b.size(2, 0) );  
183    
184    // c(i,j) = alpha * a(i) * b(j) + beta * c(i,j)
185    for ( index_type i = a.size(2, 0); i-- > 0; )
186    {
187      for ( index_type j = b.size(2, 1); j-- > 0; )
188      {
189        T1 dot = T1();
190        for ( index_type k = 0; k < a.size(2, 1); ++k )
191          dot += a.get(i, k) * b.get(k, j);
192
193        c.put(i, j, alpha * dot + beta * c.get(i, j));
194      }
195    }
196  }
197};
198
199} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
200} // namespace vsip_csl
201
202namespace vsip

204namespace impl

207/// Outer product dispatch
208template <typename T0,
209	  typename T1,
210	  typename T2,
211	  typename Block0,
212	  typename Block1,
213	  typename Block2>
214void
215outer(
216  T0 alpha, 
217  const_Vector<T0, Block0> a,
218  const_Vector<T1, Block1> b,
219  Matrix<T2, Block2>       r)
220{
221  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
222  assert(r.size(0) == a.size());
223  assert(r.size(1) == b.size());
224#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
225  Evaluator<op::outer, be::cvsip, 
226    void(Block2&, T0, Block0 const&, Block1 const&)>::exec
227    (r.block(), alpha, a.block(), b.block());
228#else
229  vsip_csl::dispatch<op::outer, void,
230    Block2&, T0, Block0 const&, Block1 const&>
231    (r.block(), alpha, a.block(), b.block());
232#endif
233}
234
235
236// Dot product dispatch.  This is intentionally not named 'dot' to avoid
237// conflicting with vsip::dot, which shares the same signature, forcing
238// the user to resolve the call themselves.
239template <typename T0, typename T1, typename Block0, typename Block1>
240typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type
241impl_dot(
242  const_Vector<T0, Block0> v,
243  const_Vector<T1, Block1> w) VSIP_NOTHROW
244{
245  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
246
247  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type return_type;
248  return_type r(0);
249
250#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
251  r = Evaluator<op::dot, be::cvsip,
252    return_type(Block0 const&, Block1 const&) >::exec
253    (v.block(), w.block());
254#else
255  r = vsip_csl::dispatch<op::dot, return_type,
256    Block0 const&, Block1 const&>
257    (v.block(), w.block());
258#endif
259  return r;
260};
261
262
263/// Generic vector-vector kron
264template <typename T0,
265          typename T1,
266          typename T2,
267          typename Block1,
268          typename Block2>
269const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type>
270impl_kron( T0 alpha, Vector<T1, Block1> v, Vector<T2, Block2> w)
271    VSIP_NOTHROW
272{
273  typedef Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, 
274    typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type> return_type;
275  return_type r(w.size(), v.size());
276
277  for (index_type i = w.size(); i-- > 0;)
278    for (index_type j = v.size(); j-- > 0;)
279      r.put(i, j, alpha * w.get(i) * v.get(j));
280
281  return r;
282}
283
284/// Generic matrix-matrix kron
285template <typename T0,
286          typename T1,
287          typename T2,
288          typename Block1,
289          typename Block2>
290const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type>
291impl_kron( T0 alpha, Matrix<T1, Block1> v, Matrix<T2, Block2> w)
292    VSIP_NOTHROW
293{
294  typedef Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, 
295    typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type> return_type;
296  const length_type row_size = v.size(0) * w.size(0);
297  const length_type col_size = v.size(1) * w.size(1);
298
299  return_type r( row_size, col_size );
300  for ( index_type i = v.size(0); i-- > 0; )
301    for ( index_type j = w.size(0); j-- > 0; )
302      for ( index_type k = v.size(1); k-- > 0; )
303        for ( index_type l = w.size(1); l-- > 0; ) 
304        {
305          T0 val = alpha * v.get(i,k) * w.get(j,l);
306          r.put( j + (i * w.size(0)), l + (k * w.size(1)), val );
307        }
308
309  return r;
310}
311
312
313/// General matrix product dispatch
314template <typename T0,
315	  typename T1,
316	  typename T2,
317	  typename T4,
318	  typename Block1,
319	  typename Block2,
320	  typename Block4>
321void
322gemp(T0 alpha, const_Matrix<T1, Block1> a,
323     const_Matrix<T2, Block2> b, T0 beta, Matrix<T4, Block4> c) 
324{
325  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
326
327  assert(c.size(0) == a.size(0));
328  assert(c.size(1) == b.size(1));
329
330#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
331  Evaluator<op::gemp, be::cvsip,
332    void(Block4&, T0, Block1 const&, Block2 const&, T0)>::exec
333    (c.block(), alpha, a.block(), b.block(), beta);
334#else
335  vsip_csl::dispatch<op::gemp, void,
336    Block4&, T0, Block1 const&, Block2 const&, T0> 
337    (c.block(), alpha, a.block(), b.block(), beta);
338#endif
339}
340
341/// General matrix sum
342template <typename T0, typename T1, typename T3, typename T4,
343  typename Block1, typename Block4>
344void 
345gems( T0 alpha, const_Matrix<T1, Block1> A, T3 beta, Matrix<T4, Block4> C) 
346{
347  assert( A.size(0) == C.size(0) );
348  assert( A.size(1) == C.size(1) );
349  C = alpha * A + beta * C;
350}
351
352
353
354/// Class to perform transpose or hermetian (conjugate-transpose),
355/// depending on value type.
356
357/// Primary case - perform transpose.
358template <typename T,
359	  typename Block>
360struct Trans_or_herm
361{
362  typedef typename const_Matrix<T, Block>::transpose_type result_type;
363
364  static result_type
365  exec(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
366  {
367    return m.transpose();
368  }
369};
370
371/// Complex specialization - perform hermetian.
372template <typename T,
373	  typename Block>
374struct Trans_or_herm<complex<T>, Block>
375{
376  typedef typename const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block>::transpose_type 
377      transpose_type;
378  typedef impl::Unary_func_view<expr::op::Conj, transpose_type> 
379      functor_type;
380  typedef typename functor_type::result_type result_type;
381
382  static result_type
383  exec(const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
384  {
385    return functor_type::apply(m.transpose());
386  } 
387};
388
389/// Perform transpose or hermetian, depending on value type.
390template <typename T,
391	  typename Block>
392inline
393typename Trans_or_herm<T, Block>::result_type
394trans_or_herm(const_Matrix<T, Block> m)
395{
396  return Trans_or_herm<T, Block>::exec(m);
397};
398
399
400
401/// Generalized class used to invoke the correct matrix operator
402template <mat_op_type OpT,
403          typename    T,
404          typename    Block>
405struct Apply_mat_op;
406
407/// 'No transpose' matrix operator
408template <typename T,
409          typename Block>
410struct Apply_mat_op<mat_ntrans, T, Block>
411{
412  typedef const_Matrix<T, Block> result_type;
413
414  static result_type
415  exec(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
416    {
417      return m;
418    }
419};
420
421/// 'Transpose' matrix operator
422template <typename T,
423          typename Block>
424struct Apply_mat_op<mat_trans, T, Block>
425{
426  typedef typename const_Matrix<T, Block>::transpose_type result_type;
427
428  static result_type
429  exec(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
430    {
431      return m.transpose();
432    }
433};
434
435/// 'Hermitian' matrix operator for non-complex types (results in transpose)
436template <typename T,
437          typename Block>
438struct Apply_mat_op<mat_herm, T, Block>
439{
440  typedef typename const_Matrix<T, Block>::transpose_type result_type;
441
442  static result_type
443  exec(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
444    {
445      return impl::trans_or_herm(m);
446    }
447};
448
449/// 'Hermitian' matrix operator for complex types (results in conjugate 
450/// transpose)
451template <typename T,
452          typename Block>
453struct Apply_mat_op<mat_herm, complex<T>, Block>
454{
455  typedef typename const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block>::transpose_type 
456      transpose_type;
457  typedef impl::Unary_func_view<expr::op::Conj, transpose_type> 
458      functor_type;
459  typedef typename functor_type::result_type result_type;
460
461  static result_type
462  exec(const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
463    {
464      return impl::trans_or_herm(m);
465    }
466};
467
468/// 'Conjugate' matrix operator for non-complex types (results in identity)
469template <typename T,
470          typename Block>
471struct Apply_mat_op<mat_conj, T, Block>
472{
473  typedef const_Matrix<T, Block> result_type;
474
475  static result_type
476  exec(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
477    {
478      return m;
479    }
480};
481
482/// 'Conjugate' matrix operator for complex types
483template <typename T,
484          typename Block>
485struct Apply_mat_op<mat_conj, complex<T>, Block>
486{
487  typedef impl::Unary_func_view<expr::op::Conj, 
488    const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block> > functor_type;
489  typedef typename functor_type::result_type result_type;
490
491  static result_type
492  exec(const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
493    {
494      return conj(m);
495    }
496};
497
498
499/// Convenience function to use matrix operator classes
500template <mat_op_type OpT,
501          typename    T,
502          typename    Block>
503typename Apply_mat_op<OpT, T, Block>::result_type
504apply_mat_op(const_Matrix<T, Block> m)
505{
506  return Apply_mat_op<OpT, T, Block>::exec(m);
507}
508
509
510/// Generic cumulative vector sum
511template <dimension_type d,
512          typename T0,
513          typename T1,
514          typename Block0,
515          typename Block1>
516void
517cumsum(
518  const_Vector<T0, Block0> v,
519  Vector<T1, Block1> w) 
520    VSIP_NOTHROW
521{
522  //  Effects: w has values equaling the cumulative sum of values in v. 
523  //
524  //  If View is Vector, d is ignored and, for 
525  //    0 <= i < v.size(), 
526  //      w.get(i) equals the sum over 0 <= j <= i of v.get(j)
527  assert( v.size() == w.size() );
528
529  T1 sum = T0();
530  for ( index_type i = 0; i < v.size(); ++i )
531  {
532    sum += v.get(i);
533    w.put(i, sum);
534  }
535}
536
537/// Generic cumulative matrix sum
538template <dimension_type d,
539          typename T0,
540          typename T1,
541          typename Block0,
542          typename Block1>
543void
544cumsum(
545  const_Matrix<T0, Block0> v,
546  Matrix<T1, Block1> w) 
547    VSIP_NOTHROW
548{
549  if ( d == 0 )
550  {
551    //  If View is Matrix and d == 0, then, for 
552    //    0 <= m < v.size(0) and 0 <= i < v.size(1),
553    //      w.get(m, i) equals the sum over 0 <= j <= i of v.get(m, j).
554
555    for ( index_type m = 0; m < v.size(0); ++m )
556    {
557      T1 sum = T0();
558      for ( index_type i = 0; i < v.size(1); ++i )
559      {
560        sum += v.get(m, i);
561        w.put(m, i, sum);
562      }
563    }
564  }
565  else
566  if ( d == 1 )
567  {
568    //  If View is Matrix and d == 1, then, for 
569    //    0 <= i < v.size(0) and 0 <= n < v.size(1), 
570    //      w.get(i, n) equals the sum over 0 <= j <= i of v.get(j, n).
571
572    for ( index_type n = 0; n < v.size(1); ++n )
573    {
574      T1 sum = T0();
575      for ( index_type i = 0; i < v.size(0); ++i )
576      {
577        sum += v.get(i, n);
578        w.put(i, n, sum);
579      }
580    }
581  }
582}
583
584
585/// Generic modulation of a vector by a complex frequency
586template <typename T0,
587          typename T1,
588          typename T2,
589          typename T3,
590          typename Block0,
591          typename Block1>
592T1
593modulate(
594  const_Vector<T0, Block0> v,
595  T1 nu,
596  T2 phi,
597  Vector<complex<T3>, Block1> w)
598    VSIP_NOTHROW
599{
600  // Requires: The only specializations which must be supported are those 
601  // having T0, T1, T2, and T3 all scalar f or alternatively T0 the same 
602  // as cscalar f and T1, T2, and T3 all scalar f.
603
604  assert(v.size() == w.size());
605  assert((Type_equal<typename impl::Scalar_of<T0>::type, T3>::value));
606  assert((Type_equal<T1, T3>::value));
607  assert((Type_equal<T2, T3>::value));
608
609  // Effects: For 0 <= i < v.size(), w.get(i) has a value equaling 
610  // the product of v.get(i) and the exponential of the product of 
611  // j (sqrt(-1)) and i * nu + phi
612
613  for ( index_type i = v.size(); i-- > 0; )
614  {
615    complex<T3> phase( 0, i * nu + phi );
616    w.put(i, v.get(i) * exp(phase));
617  }
618
619  // Returns: v.size() * nu + phi (the phase needed for processing
620  // a series frame by frame)
621
622  return v.size() * nu + phi;
623}
624
625} // namespace impl
626

630  Functions

633
634/// dot products  [math.matvec.dot]
635
636/// dot
637template <typename T0, typename T1, typename Block0, typename Block1>
638typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type
639dot(
640  const_Vector<T0, Block0> v,
641  const_Vector<T1, Block1> w) VSIP_NOTHROW
642{
643#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
644  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type result_type;
645  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
646    (impl::matvec::Description<result_type>::tag("dot", impl::extent(v)),
647     impl::matvec::Op_count_dot<result_type>::value(impl::extent(v)) );
648#endif
649  return impl::impl_dot(v, w);
650}
651
652
653/// cvjdot
654template <typename T0, typename T1, typename Block0, typename Block1>
655typename Promotion<complex<T0>, complex<T1> >::type
656cvjdot(
657  const_Vector<complex<T0>, Block0> v,
658  const_Vector<complex<T1>, Block1> w) VSIP_NOTHROW
659{
660#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
661  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type result_type;
662  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
663    (impl::matvec::Description<result_type>::tag("cvjdot", impl::extent(v)),
664     impl::matvec::Op_count_cvjdot<result_type>::value(impl::extent(v)));
665#endif
666  return impl::impl_dot(v, conj(w));
667}
668
669 
670/// Transpositions  [math.matvec.transpose]
671
672/// transpose
673template <typename T, typename Block>
674typename const_Matrix<T, Block>::transpose_type
675trans(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
676{
677#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
678  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
679    (impl::matvec::Description<T>::tag("trans", impl::extent(m)));
680#endif
681  return m.transpose();
682}
683
684/// conjugate transpose
685template <typename T, typename Block>
686typename impl::Unary_func_view<impl::expr::op::Conj,
687  typename const_Matrix<complex<T>,
688  Block>::transpose_type>::result_type
689herm(const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
690{
691  typedef typename const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block>::transpose_type 
692    transpose_type;
693  typedef impl::Unary_func_view<impl::expr::op::Conj, transpose_type> 
694    functor_type;
695
696#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
697  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
698    (impl::matvec::Description<complex<T> >::tag("herm", impl::extent(m)),
699     impl::matvec::Op_count_herm<complex<T> >::value(impl::extent(m)));
700#endif
701  return functor_type::apply(m.transpose());
702} 
703
704
705/// Kronecker tensor product  [math.matvec.kron]
706
707/// kronecker product
708template <typename T0,
709          typename T1,
710          typename T2,
711          template <typename, typename> class const_View,
712          typename Block1,
713          typename Block2>
714const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type>
715kron( T0 alpha, const_View<T1, Block1> v, const_View<T2, Block2> w )
716    VSIP_NOTHROW
717{
718#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
719  typedef typename Promotion<T0, typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type
720    >::type result_type;
721  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
722    (impl::matvec::Description<result_type>::tag("kron", impl::extent(v), 
723                                                 impl::extent(w)),
724     impl::matvec::Op_count_kron<impl::Dim_of_view<const_View>::dim, 
725     result_type>::value(impl::extent(v), impl::extent(w)));
726#endif
727  return impl::impl_kron( alpha, v, w );
728}
729
730
731/// Outer product [math.matvec.outer]
732
733/// outer product of two scalar vectors
734template <typename T0,
735          typename T1,
736          typename T2,
737          typename Block1,
738          typename Block2>
739const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type>
740outer( T0 alpha, const_Vector<T1, Block1> v, const_Vector<T2, Block2> w )
741    VSIP_NOTHROW
742{
743  typedef typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type return_type;
744#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
745  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
746    (impl::matvec::Description<return_type>::tag("outer", impl::extent(v), 
747                                                 impl::extent(w)),
748     impl::matvec::Op_count_outer<return_type>::value(impl::extent(v), 
749                                                      impl::extent(w)));
750#endif
751
752  Matrix<return_type> r(v.size(), w.size(), return_type());
753
754  impl::outer(alpha, v, w, r);
755
756  return r;
757}
758
759
760/// Generalized Matrix operations [math.matvec.gem]
761
762/// generalized matrix product
763template <mat_op_type OpA,
764          mat_op_type OpB,
765          typename T0,
766          typename T1,
767          typename T2,
768          typename T3,
769          typename T4,
770          typename Block1,
771          typename Block2,
772          typename Block4>
773void
774gemp(T0 alpha,
775     const_Matrix<T1, Block1> A,
776     const_Matrix<T2, Block2> B,
777     T3 beta,
778     Matrix<T4, Block4> C)
779  VSIP_NOTHROW
780{
781#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
782  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
783    (impl::matvec::Description<T4>::tag("gemp", impl::extent(A), 
784                                        impl::extent(B)),
785     impl::matvec::Op_count_gemp<T4>::value(impl::extent(A), 
786                                            impl::extent(B), OpA, OpB));
787#endif
788
789  // equivalent to C = alpha * OpA(A) * OpB(B) + beta * C
790
791  impl::gemp( alpha, 
792              impl::apply_mat_op<OpA>(A), 
793              impl::apply_mat_op<OpB>(B),
794              beta, 
795              C );
796} 
797
798
799/// Generalized matrix sum
800template <mat_op_type OpA,
801          typename T0,
802          typename T1,
803          typename T3,
804          typename T4,
805          typename Block1,
806          typename Block4>
807void
808gems(
809  T0 alpha,
810  const_Matrix<T1, Block1> A,
811  T3 beta,
812  Matrix<T4, Block4> C) 
813    VSIP_NOTHROW
814{
815#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
816  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
817    (impl::matvec::Description<T4>::tag("gems", impl::extent(A)),
818     impl::matvec::Op_count_gems<T4>::value(impl::extent(A), OpA));
819#endif
820  impl::gems(alpha, impl::apply_mat_op<OpA>(A), beta, C);
821}
822
823
824/// Miscellaneous functions [math.matvec.misc]
825
826/// cumulative sum
827template <dimension_type d,
828          typename T0,
829          typename T1,
830          template <typename, typename> class const_View,
831          template <typename, typename> class View,
832          typename Block0,
833          typename Block1>
834void
835cumsum(
836  const_View<T0, Block0> v,
837  View<T1, Block1> w) 
838    VSIP_NOTHROW
839{
840#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
841  dimension_type const dim = impl::Dim_of_view<const_View>::dim;
842  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
843    (impl::matvec::Description<T0>::tag("cumsum", impl::extent(v)),
844     impl::matvec::Op_count_cumsum<dim, T0>::value(impl::extent(v)));
845#endif
846
847  impl::cumsum<d>(v, w);
848}
849
850/// modulate
851template <typename T0,
852          typename T1,
853          typename T2,
854          typename T3,
855          typename Block0,
856          typename Block1>
857T1
858modulate(
859  const_Vector<T0, Block0> v,
860  T1 nu,
861  T2 phi,
862  Vector<complex<T3>, Block1> w)
863    VSIP_NOTHROW
864{
865#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
866  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
867    (impl::matvec::Description<T0>::tag("modulate", impl::extent(v)),
868     impl::matvec::Op_count_modulate<T0>::value(impl::extent(v)));
869#endif
870  return impl::modulate(v, nu, phi, w);
871}
